title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Mike Florio about the NFL's decision to appeal the length of Deshaun Watson's suspension. Jason Garrett calls in and discusses the transition from being an NFL coach to a broadcaster. Plus, NBC's Rebecca Lowe previews the Premier league and asks about the some of the differences in terms between the US and the UK

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
